CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, August 31, 1946, pg. 10 reads: "American Bridge Tournament Closes In Pittsburgh - Closing Saturday night in Pittsburgh was one of the most successful of all ABA gatherings, which drew some 500 bridge players to Pennsylvania to spend a week vying for honors...Re-elected were the officials of last year, who include, Mrs. P.W. Goode of Mobile; Mrs. Georgia Stevens, Detroit; Victor Daly, Dee Cee; Dr. E.T. Balsaw, Mobile; John A. Stevens, Detroit; Mrs. Norine Mitchell, Chicago; Ellis Vail, Los Angeles and Dr. J.B. Goggins, Detroit...All photos by Harris."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of Mrs. P. W. Goode, Georgia Stevens, Victor Daly, Dr. E. T. Balsaw, John A. Stevens, Norine Mitchell, Ellis Vail, and Dr. J. B. Goggins, standing in Kay Boys Club for Thirteenth Annual Conference of the American Bridge Association
